verses.roman:
ṣaṣṭhaś ca cakṣuṣaḥ putraś
cākṣuṣo nāma vai manuḥ
pūru-pūruṣa-sudyumna-
pramukhāś cākṣuṣātmajāḥ

synonyms: ṣaṣṭhaḥ—the sixth; ca—and; cakṣuṣaḥ—of Cakṣu; putraḥ—the son; cākṣuṣaḥ—Cākṣuṣa; nāma—named; vai—indeed; manuḥ—Manu; pūru—Pūru; pūruṣa—Pūruṣa; sudyumna—Sudyumna; pramukhāḥ—headed by; cākṣuṣa-ātma-jāḥ—the sons of Cākṣuṣa.
translation: The son of Cakṣu known as Cākṣuṣa was the sixth Manu. He had many sons, headed by Pūru, Pūruṣa and Sudyumna.
